SEARCH
Package Implementation

Class VirtualPets

java.lang.Object
Implementation.DataManager
Implementation.VirtualPets
public class VirtualPets extends Implementation.DataManager
The VirtualPets class extends DataManager to provide methods for retrieving and updating pet-related data from a CSV file. This class manages pet information, including pet ID, owner (player ID), pet name, age, hunger, happiness, health, and last fed timestamp.

  • Field Summary

    • getVitalStats

      public Implementation.VitalStats getVitalStats(String petId)
      Retrieves a VitalStats object representing the pet's current vital statistics. Assumes that hunger, happiness, health, and sleep are stored in columns 4, 5, 6, and 7 respectively.
      Parameters:
      petId - The ID of the pet.

    • updateVitalStats

      public void updateVitalStats(String petId, Implementation.VitalStats stats)
      Updates the CSV record for a pet with the latest vital statistics.
      Parameters:
      petId - The ID of the pet.
      stats - The stats of the pet, as a VitalStats object

    • updatePetVitals

      public void updatePetVitals(String petId)
      Convenience method to update a pet's vital stats in a game tick. This method retrieves the current stats, applies the update cycle, and saves the new values.
      Parameters:
      petId - The ID of the pet.

      public void updateLastAccessed(String petId)
      Updates the last accessed date for the given pet ID to the current time.
      Parameters:
      petId - The ID of the pet.

    • getPetType

      public String getPetType(String petId)
      Retrieves the pet type string (e.g., "dog", "cat", "dragon") for the given pet ID. Reads from the new pet type column (index 12).
      Parameters:
      petId - The ID of the pet.
      Returns:
      The pet type as a lowercase String, or "cat" as a default if not found or column missing.

    • getPetTypeIndex

      public int getPetTypeIndex(String petId)
      Retrieves the pet type index for the given pet ID. Reads from the new pet type column (index 12).
      Parameters:
      petId - The ID of the pet.
      Returns:
      The pet type index as an integer.

    • setPetType

      public void setPetType(String petId, String petType)
      Sets the pet type string for the given pet ID in the new column (index 12).
      Parameters:
      petId - The ID of the pet.
      petType - The pet type string (e.g., "dog", "cat", "dragon").
